resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/89545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>89545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DUNEL_sample</catalog>
            <entry>0005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">KS2 Maths Y4 Measurements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">KS2 Messen Mathe-Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">KS2 Mesures des Maths Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">KS2 Medidas Dos Maths Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">KS2 Misure Di Per la matematica Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">KS2 μετρήσεις μαθηματικών Y4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">KS2 Medidas De la Matemáticas Y4</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Recognising and using standard metric units km, m, cm, mm, kg, g, l, ml, including their abbreviations, Suggest suitable units to estimate or measure length, mass or capacity, Match units of measure with their equivalent measurements ie 1 cm equals 10 mm, Work out problems from information given.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">units</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">km</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kg</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metrischen Standardmaßeinheiten Kilometer, m, 
Zentimeter, Millimeter, Kilogramm, g, L, ml erkennend und mit, 
einschließlich ihre Abkürzungen, schlagen Sie verwendbare 
Maßeinheiten Schätzung oder Maßzur länge, Masse vor, oder die 
Kapazität, Übereinstimmung Maßeinheiten des Masses mit ihrem 
gleichwertigen Messen-IE die 1 Zentimeter Gleichgestellten 10 
Millimeter, arbeiten Probleme von den gegebenen Informationen aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En identifiant et en utilisant les unités 
métriques standard le kilomètre, m, le centimètre, le millimètre, 
le kilogramme, g, l, ml, y compris leurs abréviations, suggérez les 
unités appropriées à la longueur d'évaluation ou de mesure, la 
masse ou la capacité, unités de mesure d'allumette avec leur IE 
équivalent de mesures des égales de 1 centimètre 10 millimètres, 
établissent des problèmes de l'information fournie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reconhecendo e usando as unidades métricas 
padrão quilômetro, m, cm, milímetro, quilograma, g, l, ml, 
including suas abreviaturas, sugira unidades apropriadas ao 
comprimento da estimativa ou da medida, massa ou capacidade, unidades 
do fósforo da medida com seu IE equivalente das medidas iguais de 1 
cm 10 milímetros, trabalho para fora dos problemas da informação 
dada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riconoscendo ed usando le unità metriche 
standard il chilometro, la m., il centimetro, il millimetro, il 
chilogrammo, il g, la l, ml, compreso le loro abbreviazioni, 
suggerisca le unità adatte alla lunghezza di misura o di valutazione,
massa o la capienza, unità della corrispondenza della misura con il 
loro IE equivalente di misure i uguali da 1 centimetro 10 millimetri, 
risolve i problemi dalle informazioni fornite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αναγνώριση και η χρησιμοποίηση των πρότυπων μετρικών
μονάδων χλμ, μ, εκατ., χιλ., κλ, γ, λ, μιλ., συμπεριλαμβανομένων των
συντμήσεών τους, προτείνουν στις κατάλληλες μονάδες για να 
υπολογίσουν ή να μετρήσουν το μήκος, μάζα ή η ικανότητα, 
μονάδες αντιστοιχιών του μέτρου με τις ισοδύναμες μετρήσεις τους 
δηλ. 1 εκατ. είναι ίσο με 10 χιλ., επιλύει τα προβλήματα από τις 
πληροφορίες που δίνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reconociendo y con las unidades métricas 
estándares kilómetro, m, centímetro, milímetro, kilogramo, g, l, 
ml, incluyendo sus abreviaturas, sugiera las unidades convenientes a 
la longitud de la estimación o de la medida, masa o la capacidad, 
unidades del emparejamiento de la medida con su IE equivalente de las 
medidas los iguales de 1 centímetro 10 milímetros, resuelve 
problemas de la información dada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">metrisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Millimeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentimeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kilometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kilogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">métrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">millimètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centimètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">kilomètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">kilogramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">métrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">milímetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quilômetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">millimetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centimetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chilometro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chilogrammo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετρικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
